text: And he found a wolf with a dog's body tied around his neck, and said to him, Who chained thee, and fed thee thus? "My master, the hunter", replied the dog. - May the gods save us from wolves of such fate! I'd rather starve than have to carry such a heavy necklace. Hard work in freedom is worth more than the pleasure of slavery.
title: El lobo y el perro
author: nan Esopo
